sentences.english: ATRAP, in contrast, captures about five million positrons.
sentences.chinese: 相较之下，ATRAP可以捕捉到约500万个正子。

sentences.english: The case demonstrates the value of FDG-PET scan in differentiating benign from malignancy in surveying ovarian lesions.
sentences.chinese: 此例亦说明正子摄影于区分卵巢病灶良恶性之价值。
